title: WorkspaceConfig
description: Configures all aspects of the moon workspace. Docs: https://moonrepo.dev/docs/config/workspace

codeowners.description: Configures code ownership rules for generating a `CODEOWNERS` file.

constraints.description: Configures boundaries and constraints between projects.

experiments.description: Configures experiments across the entire moon workspace.

extends.description: Extends another workspace configuration file. Supports a relative file path or a secure URL.

extensions.description: Configures extensions that can be executed with `moon ext`.

generator.description: Configures the generator for scaffolding from templates.

hasher.description: Configures aspects of the content hashing engine.

notifier.description: Configures how and where notifications are sent.

projects.description: Configures all projects within the workspace to create a project graph. Accepts a list of globs, a mapping of projects to relative file paths, or both values.

runner.description: Configures aspects of the task runner (also known as the action pipeline).

telemetry.description: Collects anonymous usage information, and checks for new moon versions.

versionConstraint.description: Requires a specific version of the `moon` binary.

CodeownersConfig.title: CodeownersConfig
CodeownersConfig.description: Configures code ownership rules for generating a `CODEOWNERS` file.

globalPaths.description: Paths that are applied globally to all projects. Can be relative from the workspace root, or a wildcard match for any depth.

orderBy.description: How to order ownership rules within the generated file.

syncOnRun.description: Generates a `CODEOWNERS` file after aggregating all ownership rules from each project in the workspace.

ConstraintsConfig.title: ConstraintsConfig
ConstraintsConfig.description: Configures boundaries and constraints between projects.

enforceProjectTypeRelationships.description: Enforces relationships between projects based on each project's `type` setting.

tagRelationships.description: Enforces relationships between projects based on each project's `tags` setting. Requires a mapping of tags, to acceptable tags.

ExperimentsConfig.title: ExperimentsConfig
ExperimentsConfig.description: Configures experiments across the entire moon workspace.

strictProjectAliases.description: Ensure that the a project alias is only used once. Duplicate aliases will trigger a hard failure.

config.description: Arbitrary configuration that'll be passed to the WASM plugin.

plugin.description: Location of the WASM plugin to use.

GeneratorConfig.title: GeneratorConfig
GeneratorConfig.description: Configures the generator for scaffolding from templates.

templates.description: The list of file paths, relative from the workspace root, in which to locate templates.

HasherConfig.title: HasherConfig
HasherConfig.description: Configures aspects of the content hashing engine.

batchSize.description: The number of files to include in each hash operation.

ignoreMissingPatterns.description: When `warnOnMissingInputs` is enabled, filters missing file paths from logging a warning.

ignorePatterns.description: Filters file paths that match a configured glob pattern when a hash is being generated. Patterns are workspace relative, so prefixing with `**` is recommended.

optimization.description: The optimization to use when hashing.

walkStrategy.description: The strategy to use when walking the file system.

warnOnMissingInputs.description: Logs a warning when a task has configured an explicit file path input, and that file does not exist when hashing.

NotifierConfig.title: NotifierConfig
NotifierConfig.description: Configures how and where notifications are sent.

RunnerConfig.title: RunnerConfig
RunnerConfig.description: Configures aspects of the task runner (also known as the action pipeline).

archivableTargets.description: List of target's for tasks without outputs, that should be cached and persisted.

cacheLifetime.description: The lifetime in which task outputs will be cached.

inheritColorsForPipedTasks.description: Automatically inherit color settings for all tasks being ran.

logRunningCommand.description: Logs the task's command and arguments when running the task.

hooks.description: A mapping of hooks to commands to run when the hook is triggered.

manager.description: The VCS client being utilized by the repository.

provider.description: The upstream version control provider, where the repository source code is stored.

remoteCandidates.description: List of remote's in which to compare branches against.

syncHooks.description: Generates hooks and scripts based on the `hooks` setting.

globs.description: A list of globs in which to locate project directories. Can be suffixed with `moon.yml` to only find distinct projects.

sources.description: A mapping of project IDs to relative file paths to each project directory.
